response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product holds immense value to me, but I believe its true potential lies in the hands of someone like yourself who can appreciate its worth and utilize it to its fullest potential.

Considering the significant impact this product could have on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This represents a remarkable saving compared to its original valuation of $1,500,000, making it an exceptional investment for you.

I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to the possibility of working together to bring this product to life in your hands. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
